resources.string: App isn\'t supported on your device. If your device is not rooted and is made by Samsung, report this to developer.

1. Press activate. \n2. Paste your Knox standard SDK enterprise key below. If you don\'t have one, sign in here - https://seap.samsung.com/enrollment, and get your Enterprise key here - https://seap.samsung.com/license-keys. It should be 128 bytes and not start with letters KLM.
No internet connection. Please turn on Wi-Fi or mobile data and restart the app.
Consider whitelisting the app first. You can\'t whitelist wildcards. Enter a valid domain name only. Press on a name to remove it.
Do you really want to turn off and delete SABS?
Enter a valid domain name only. Press on a name to remove it.
Well, I\'m not even in college yet. \nIt would be nice to have a spare dollar in the future.
Subscribe for {{price}} per 3 month with 20% discount

You can add more domain (hosts) list URLs. It must only include domain names, and comments in lines starting with #. Other lines may break SABS. After adding an URL, updating a file or (un)checking a box, turn blocking off then on.
Your device is running an old version of KNOX. Upgrade your device or perform an update. Otherwise, you may experience crashes on certain functions.
Importing disabled apps list from storage
Disabled apps list exported to sabs.txt
Unexpected error. You aren\'t supposed to see this screen.

SABS will let you block domains, control permissions and more! 
Most imporantly - it's free and open source. 

For SABS to work you need to either change the package name in Manifest file or compile app with a changed package name yourself. Check out how to do it here: https://github.com/LayoutXML/SABS#setup
SABS uses Samsung\'s KNOX tools to block domains system-wide without running in background! KNOX SDK requires administrative permissions and you will be asked to grant them soon.

You need to generate a license key first. Go to https://seap.samsung.com/enrollment and sign in with your Samsung account. Then go to https://seap.samsung.com/license-keys/create#section-knox-standard-sdk and generate a key as shown in the picture. 
1. Go to \“Legacy SDKs\” 
2. Go to \”Knox Standard SDK\” 
3. Select \”Enterprise\” 
4. Write any word as alias name 
5. Press generate 
 Copy your key and be ready to paste it. If your key starts with letters "KLM" - you have generated the wrong key.
Remember - if license activation fails a couple of times, uninstall and reinstall the app.
Add, remove websites, subscribe to providers
Set DNS Address 1 and DNS Address 2
Turn off blocking in apps where you don\'t want to block domains
Error reading version number and version code
Unblock a domain if you want it to load
Block domains that you don\'t want to load
Add blocklists with domains you wan\'t to get blocked
SABS is an domain blocker with extra functionality that is maintained by LayoutXML and MMotti. It is based on Adhell open source project.
Paste your 128-byte Knox standard SDK Enterprise key below. It should not start with letters KLM.

Some actions may make your system unstable. To prevent any changes to get applied, select \"Uninstall SABS\" in app settings! Otherwise, the changes to the system will be applied. This screen is shown so that you don\'t change anything inadvertently while your phone is in your pocket. You can disable this warning in the Settings screen
Other settings that didn\'t fit any category
Turn off blocking and uninstall app.
Show warning on app start-up to prevent accidental presses while phone is in the pocket
Set the theme to AMOLED black and restart the app
Block Port 53 on Chrome (Stable, Canary, Beta, Dev) so that domains could be blocked on these apps. After changing value, turn blocking off and on
Block Port 53 in all apps (not recommended)
If you like SABS, you can donate to LayoutXML on Paypal or Google Play. Would you like to do it?
You can donate to LayoutXML by buying support app on Google Play or on Paypal. I\'m a student who is about to go to university. Every dollar helps.
You can buy an app on Google Play that does nothing
You can donate your desired sum of money on Paypal
Prevent theme store from being launched to allow custom themes from XDA
Do you really want to restore all permissions?
